column1: Chardé Cobbs, Lori Coleman, and Patsy Kerstetter
03/06/1959 0 Born in Salem, Indiana to George and Diana Wardrip
1983 24 Married a woman in Wichita Falls
1983 24 Was promoted from janitor to orderly
1984 25 Received a less-than-honorable discharge from National Guard
12/21/1984 25 Killed Terry Sims (21) in Wichita Falls, TX
1984 25 Arrested for rape and slaying of young women
01/19/1985 25 Killed Toni Gibbs (23) in Archer County, TX
03/29/1985 26 Killed Deborah Gibbs (25) in Fort Worth, TX
09/20/1985 26 Killed Ellen Blau (21) in Wichita Falls, TX
05/06/1986 27 Killed Tina Kimbrew (21) in Wichita Falls, TX
Plead guilty for the murder of Tina Kimbrew and was sentenced to 35 years
12/1997 38 Was paroled after 11 years in prison
1999 38 DNA evidence ties Wardrip to the 1985 murders of Sims and Gibbs
Arrested for the murders of Sims and Gibbs. Eventually confesses to the
murders of Sims, Gibbs, Taylor, and Blau
